sentences.en: a fighter pilot
sentences.cn: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.en: a harbour pilot
sentences.cn: 海港领航员

sentences.en: an airline pilot
sentences.cn: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.en: He had finally accomplished his dream of becoming a pilot.
sentences.cn: 他最终实现了成为一名飞行员的梦想。

sentences.en: He was once described as a fussily accurate test pilot.
sentences.cn: 他一度被称为过分讲究精准的试飞员。

sentences.en: He was the very model of the dashing RAF pilot.
sentences.cn: 他正是风度翩翩的英国皇家空军飞行员的典范。

sentences.en: Luke sat directly behind the pilot and conversed with him.
sentences.cn: 卢克就坐在飞行员后面，并且和他说着话。

sentences.en: Our pilot reduced height until we hugged the ground.
sentences.cn: 飞行员降低了高度，最后我们紧贴着地面飞行。

sentences.en: The airport ground crew tried to dissuade the pilot from taking off.
sentences.cn: 机场地勤人员试图阻止这位飞行员驾机起飞。

sentences.en: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.cn: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

sentences.en: The pilot bailed out safely.
sentences.cn: 飞行员安全地跳伞逃生。

sentences.en: The pilot ejected from the plane and escaped injury.
sentences.cn: 飞行员从飞机中弹出，安然无恙。

sentences.en: The pilot instinctively maneuvered to avoid them.
sentences.cn: 飞行员本能地驾机避开他们。

sentences.en: The pilot throttles back slightly to maintain level flight.
sentences.cn: 飞行员稍稍减速，以保持水平飞行。

sentences.en: The pilot told the control tower that he'd run into technical trouble.
sentences.cn: 飞行员报告机场控制塔他遇到了技术问题。

sentences.en: The pilot was seriously injured and the co-pilot took over.
sentences.cn: 飞机驾驶员受了重伤，副驾驶员于是代替其驾驶。

sentences.en: The pilot wisely decided to return to Farnborough post haste.
sentences.cn: 飞行员明智地决定尽快返回法恩伯勒。

sentences.en: The plan is to launch a pilot programme next summer.
sentences.cn: 计划是在明年夏天实施一个试验性方案。

sentences.en: The service is being expanded following the success of a pilot scheme.
sentences.cn: 在试验性方案获得成功后，这项服务正在推广中。

sentences.en: Tomorrow he would tell his pilot to get the aircraft ready.
sentences.cn: 明天他会告诉他的飞行员准备好飞机。
